| History                 = The Lookups was a support group initiated by [[Edwin Jarvis (Earth-616)|Edwin Jarvis]] for friends and loved ones of super-powered individuals. They hold weekly meetings at [[Saint Joseph's Church]]. [[WHO-VER 5.0]] drones donated by [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark]] project face-obscuring technology to protect anonymity, and a gaseous potion created by [[Stephen Strange (Earth-616)|Doctor Strange]] clouds certain kinds of memories to prevent remembrance of specific details concerning another member's identity.

After returning to [[New York City|New York]], [[Carlie Cooper (Earth-616)|Carlie Cooper]] began to attend Lookups meetings to ease the weight of knowing [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]]'s identity. She approached [[Mary Jane Watson (Earth-616)|Mary Jane Watson]], who had recently restarted a relationship with Spider-Man, and introduced her to the Lookups. Mary Jane attended a meeting that day, and was welcomed by Jarvis. He encouraged her to observe a meeting since she was reluctant to join,{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 5 9}} and she later spoke to the group before they adjourned.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 5 10}}

| Trivia                  = * The Lookups was named by [[Janet Van Dyne (Earth-616)|Janet Van Dyne]].{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 5 9}}
